about_the_game:
Are YOU brave enough to face the savage demons of the underworld...?

Evil stalks the land as undead hordes rise from their graves to terrorize the living. Embark on an epic quest from Moonstone Hills, to the shadowy streets of Port Blacksand, to the depths of Darkwood Forest, and ultimately face your worst nightmare...

May Your Stamina Never Fail!

Unlike some of the other gamebooks in the library from the 80s and 90s, The Port of Peril is relatively new, having been published for the first time in 2017. Written by Ian Livingstone, a Collector's Edition of the gamebook was launched and this digital version uses Iain McCaig's cover from that limited run hardback. It also features interior illustrations from Róger Goulart, that first appeared in the Brazilian edition of the book, published by Jambô Editora!

NEW FEATURES

  • Make the gamebook as easy or hard as you like and even turn on a special 'Free Read' mode to play the book like an old-school cheater!
  • Map feature makes it easy to keep track of everywhere you have explored during current and previous playthroughs.
  • Unlimited Bookmarks allow you to revisit difficult sections as many times as desired.
  • Licensed artwork form Iain McCaig and Róger Goulart.
  • Automated Adventure Sheet that keeps track of your stats, inventory and knowledge gained during your journey.
